amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used in contravention of section 642 of the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996 which prohibits localities from enacting laws that prevent police officers from reporting immigration information to the Federal government.

action.text: Mr. Sabo raised a point of order against the King (IA) amendment (A033). Mr. Sabo stated that the amendment sought to impose new duties and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. Point of order overruled by the Chair.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A033) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 179 (Roll no. 223).
